title: AutoUpdateMode (Enum)
text:
TYPE AutoUpdateMode :
Auto update mode for a given point type.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: NoUpdate
rows.Comment: No cyclic reads for the given point type.

rows.Name: OnlyForPointObserver
rows.Comment:
Cyclic reads for the given point type limited to points used
by PointObservers.

rows.Name: AllPoints
rows.Comment: Cyclic reads for all points of the given point type.
